Articles.Content: Hi guys, i have a little bit problem here with KSP 1.0 version, i can't create any maneuver node in the blue line. i can only do that when i use mechjeb. any suggestion ?

Are you playing career mode, science mode, or sandbox? In career mode, you have to upgrade BOTH your tracking station and mission control before maneuver nodes are available. Sorry I can't speak to Mechjeb as I'm a stock player.
ah...mission control...damn,forgot to upgrade it, thanks Xavven
